EmailTemplate.subject: Student Load Repay Options
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting American Student Assistance® (ASA). Here is some additional information that can help you to manage your student loan payments.
Changing Your Payment Plan: There are several different repayment options that can help reduce your monthly payment amount.
Postponing Payments: If you are unemployed, returning to school, on active military service, or facing financial hardship, you may be eligible to postpone your payments with deferment or forbearance.
If you have any other questions or concerns, please email us at AskASA@asa.org.
Thank you,
American Student Assistance
